queries.name: available_vms
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId FROM `QE-server-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-server-pool`.state = 'available'  ) AS pools group by poolId
queries.description: Available VMs for each server pool

queries.name: busy_vms
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId FROM `QE-server-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-server-pool`.state != 'available') AS pools group by poolId
queries.description: Busy VMs for each server pool

queries.name: vm_states
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, state FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE state IS NOT MISSING GROUP BY state
queries.description: Count of VMs in each state

queries.name: available_vms_by_os
queries.query: SELECT os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE state = 'available' and os is not missing GROUP BY os

queries.name: busy_vms_by_os
queries.query: SELECT os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE state != 'available' and os is not missing GROUP BY os

queries.name: total_available_vms
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE state = 'available'

queries.name: total_busy_vms
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE state != 'available'

queries.name: available_vms_by_os_and_pool
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId, os FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId, `QE-server-pool`.os as os FROM `QE-server-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-server-pool`.state = 'available') AS pools GROUP BY poolId, os

queries.name: vms_by_state_and_pool
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, state, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId, state FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE UNION ALL SELECT poolId, `QE-server-pool`.state as state FROM `QE-server-pool` UNNEST poolId) AS pools GROUP BY poolId, state

queries.name: vms_by_state_and_os
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, state, os FROM `QE-server-pool` where os is not missing and state is not missing GROUP BY os, state

queries.name: busy_vms_by_os_and_pool
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId, os FROM `QE-server-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state!='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId, `QE-server-pool`.os as os FROM `QE-server-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-server-pool`.state != 'available') AS pools GROUP BY poolId, os

queries.name: mobile_available_vms
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId FROM `QE-mobile-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-mobile-pool`.state = 'available'  ) AS pools group by poolId
queries.description: Available VMs for each server pool

queries.name: mobile_busy_vms
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId FROM `QE-mobile-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-mobile-pool`.state != 'available') AS pools group by poolId
queries.description: Busy VMs for each server pool

queries.name: mobile_vm_states
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, state FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE state is not missing GROUP BY state
queries.description: Count of VMs in each state

queries.name: mobile_available_vms_by_os
queries.query: SELECT os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE state = 'available' and os is not missing GROUP BY os

queries.name: mobile_busy_vms_by_os
queries.query: SELECT os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE state != 'available' and os is not missing GROUP BY os

queries.name: mobile_total_available_vms
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE state = 'available'

queries.name: mobile_total_busy_vms
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE state != 'available'

queries.name: mobile_available_vms_by_os_and_pool
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId, os FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId, `QE-mobile-pool`.os as os FROM `QE-mobile-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-mobile-pool`.state = 'available') AS pools GROUP BY poolId, os

queries.name: mobile_vms_by_state_and_pool
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, state, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId, state FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE UNION ALL SELECT poolId, `QE-mobile-pool`.state as state FROM `QE-mobile-pool` UNNEST poolId) AS pools GROUP BY poolId, state

queries.name: mobile_vms_by_state_and_os
queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, state, os FROM `QE-mobile-pool` where os is not missing GROUP BY os, state

queries.name: mobile_busy_vms_by_os_and_pool
queries.query: SELECT poolId as `pool`, os, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT poolId, os FROM `QE-mobile-pool` WHERE IS_ARRAY(poolId)=FALSE and state!='available' UNION ALL SELECT poolId, `QE-mobile-pool`.os as os FROM `QE-mobile-pool` UNNEST poolId where `QE-mobile-pool`.state != 'available') AS pools GROUP BY poolId, os
